scripts.dist: yarn dist:node && yarn dist:browser:modern && yarn dist:browser:cjs
scripts.dist:node: microbundle build --raw --target node --format cjs src/index.ts --output dist/ndarray-pixels.js
scripts.dist:browser:modern: microbundle build --raw --target web --format modern src/index.ts --output dist/ndarray-pixels-browser.js --alias get-pixels=./browser-get-pixels.ts,save-pixels=./browser-save-pixels.ts
scripts.dist:browser:cjs: microbundle build --raw --target web --format cjs src/index.ts --output dist/ndarray-pixels-browser.js --alias get-pixels=./browser-get-pixels.ts,save-pixels=./browser-save-pixels.ts
scripts.docs: typedoc src/index.ts --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ./docs --hideBreadcrumbs && cat docs/modules.md | tail -n +12 | replace-between --target README.md --token API && rm -rf docs
scripts.version: yarn dist && yarn docs && git add -u
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
